text: The 2015 French Athletics Championships was the 127th edition of the national championship in outdoor track and field for France. It was held on 10–12 July at the Stadium Lille Métropole in Villeneuve-d'Ascq. A total of 38 events (divided evenly between the sexes) were contested over the three-day competition. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |100 metres | Jimmy Vicaut || 9.92 | Christophe Lemaitre || 10.07 |
